verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4468>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, came this <S%H1697>word<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee to <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H1639>them<s%>; diminish not a <S%H1697>word<s%>.

It may be they will <S%H8085>hearken<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>; that I may <S%H5162>repent<s%> me of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I <S%H2803>purpose<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: If ye will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to <S%H3212>me<s%>, to walk in my <S%H8451>law<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>,

to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, whom I <S%H7971>send<s%> unto <S%H7925>you<s%>, even rising up early and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them<s%>, but ye have not hearkened;

then will I <S%H5414>make<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and will <S%H5414>make<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> to all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3414>pass<s%>, when Jeremiah had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, Thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Why hast thou <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be like <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2717>desolate<s%>, without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>? And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6950>gathered<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And when the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, they came <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s house.

Then <S%H559>spake<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> unto the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>; for he hath <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%>, as ye have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against this <S%H1004>house<s%> and against this <S%H5892>city<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that ye have <S%H8085>heard<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5162>repent<s%> him of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that he hath pronounced against <S%H1696>you<s%>.
But as for <S%H3027>me<s%>, behold, I am in your hand: <S%H6213>do<s%> with me as <S%H5869>is<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and right in your <S%H3477>eyes<s%>.

Only <S%H3045>know<s%> ye for <S%H3045>certain<s%> <S%H4191>that<s%>, if ye put me to death, ye will <S%H5414>bring<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon <S%H5892>yourselves<s%>, and upon this city, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H571>thereof<s%>; for of a truth <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>: This <S%H376>man<s%> is not <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>; for he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%> to all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

400 <S%H4320><s%> the <S%H4183>Morashtite<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and he <S%H559>spake<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: <S%H6726>Zion<s%> shall be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> as a <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall become <S%H5856>heaps<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H3293>forest<s%>.

Did <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H4191>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>? did he not <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the favor of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> him of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which he had <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H587>them<s%>? Thus should we <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against our own <S%H5315>souls<s%>.

And there was also a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> of <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>; and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%> and against this <S%H776>land<s%> according to all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>:

and when <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, with all his <S%H1368>mighty-men<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>; but when <S%H223>Uriah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>, he was afraid, and <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

and <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H494>namely<s%>, Elnathan the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%>, and certain <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H4714>him<s%>, into Egypt;

and they fetched <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H223>Uriah<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, who <S%H5221>slew<s%> him with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> his dead <S%H5038>body<s%> into the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>common<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> was with <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, that they should not <S%H5414>give<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
